Description: Limestone stela with Greek alphabetic inscription; illiterate metrical epitaph in six lines commemorating Menelaos, a sailor.
Curator's comments: No information is supplied about the findspot of the stone, though its origin in a Cairo dealer's shop and its date both suggest it was found in Egypt. For the text, see Fraser and Maas 1955, 116-117 no. II. Biblliography: Fraser, P.M. and Maas, P. 1955, 'Three Hellenistic epigrams from Egypt', Journal of Egyptian Archaeology 41, 115-18.
